Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht drilled a three-pointer over Bol Bol with 4.8 seconds remaining to tie the score at 113-113
Knecht took over in the overtime period to ice the game for Los Angeles, hitting a handful of three-pointers and converting a late and-one attempt
Pre-Game Insights: Suns coach Mike Budenholzer confirmed Jusuf Nurkic would make his lone preseason appearance while Grayson Allen would miss the finale
LeBron James was rested by the Lakers
Budenholzer emphasized the importance of the preseason games as a foundation for the team's development
Post-Match Reflections: Kawhi Leonard made two clutch free throws to seal the win in overtime
Kevin Durant (19) and Devin Booker (22) led the Suns in scoring but were not enough to overcome the Lakers
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis led all scorers with 15 points to pair with five rebounds after the opening 12 minutes
The Lakers shot 8 of 15 from three-point land in the first quarter
Phoenix shot a strong 60% from the field in the second quarter
